kw.name: Acessar o Site Web ONG Coletivo Encoraja e logar com o usuário Administrador
Dado que o navergador esteja aberto no site da ONG Coletivo Encoraja
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: E fazer Login com Usuário Administrador
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element '//button[@class='inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 bg-[#702054] text-primary-foreground hover:bg-[#b03e88] h-10 px-4 py-2 mt-4'][contains(.,'Entrar')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

test.name: TC001 - Administrador cadastra evento pendente no site.
